name: Dragon's Adventure
description:
Travel to a fantasy kingdom, a magical forest, and a mermaid cove to help residents through mini-games and gain map pieces to help a baby dragon find home! A cozy point-and-click adventure made with children in mind but that anyone will enjoy playing! Play through the entire story or visit the mini-games arcade to replay games anytime.

This game was created as our team's university computer science senior capstone project. Through collaboration with different departments, the game has full voice-over dialogue, original artwork, animations, and music.
